author: RTÉ News
title: Trump signs $2 trillion US virus recovery plan
description: President Donald Trump has signed into law a 2 Trillion Dollar rescue plan to salvage the US economy crippled by the novel coronavirus.
content:
President Donald Trump has signed into law a 2 Trillion Dollar rescue plan to salvage the US economy crippled by the novel coronavirus.
The United States has recorded more than 100,000 confirmed cases of virus infections and almost 1,700 deaths.
